title: What happens when astronauts return back to earth after spending few months in space? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as I know . . It takes them quite some time to adjust to gravity . Take it as a deadlift . But in this case the extra weight is in your body . . Sometimes also there can be disorientation due to the pressure exerted while re entering earthy atmosphere . There is a possibility of someone passing out . But human body is one amazing adaptable specimen . . They adapt quickly and then its back to normal . Hope it helps . B
